about.title: About Mr.üÜñ ProReader
about.description: Your AI-Powered English Learning Adventure! üöÄ Master reading through personalized guidance, interactive games, and gamified vocabulary practice. Learning English has never been this fun!

objectives.title: Learning Goals
objectives.personalized: Adaptive Learning - Content tailored to your age (8-18 years old)
objectives.comprehension: Deep Understanding - Build comprehension through summaries, mind maps, and interactive tests
objectives.vocabulary: Vocabulary Mastery - Learn with bilingual definitions, flashcards, quizzes, and spelling games!
objectives.gamification: Learn Through Play - Earn streaks, beat the clock, and track your progress with fun challenges
objectives.privacy: Privacy First - All your progress is saved locally in your browser

features.title: Powerful Features
features.ocr: Smart OCR - Snap a photo and extract text from any reading material
features.adaptation: Level Adaptation - AI rewrites text to match your reading level
features.visual: Visual Learning - Auto-generate summaries and interactive mind maps
features.glossary: Smart Glossary - Bilingual definitions with real-world examples
features.flashcard: Flashcard Review - Flip cards to learn, rate difficulty, and track your progress
features.quiz: Vocabulary Quiz - Test your knowledge with multiple-choice and fill-in-the-blank questions
features.spelling: Spelling Challenge - 4 exciting game modes: Listen & Type, Letter Scramble, Fill Blanks, and Mixed!
features.tts: Text-to-Speech - Perfect your pronunciation by listening to words and sentences
features.sentenceAnalysis: Sentence Analysis - AI breaks down complex sentences into grammar, meaning, and usage tips

workflow.title: Your Learning Journey
workflow.upload: Upload - Snap or upload photos of your reading material
workflow.summary: Summary - Get a quick overview of what you're reading
workflow.adapt: Adapt - Read at your level with AI-adapted text
workflow.mindmap: Mind Map - Explore concepts with an interactive visual diagram
workflow.test: Test - Challenge yourself with comprehension questions
workflow.analyze: Analyze - Select any sentence for AI-powered grammar and meaning breakdown
workflow.highlight: Highlight - Mark important words to build your vocabulary list
workflow.glossary: Glossary - Learn words with bilingual definitions and examples
workflow.spelling: Spelling - Practice spelling through fun interactive games
workflow.vocabQuiz: Quiz - Test your vocabulary with flashcards and quizzes

spelling.title: Spelling Challenge
spelling.subtitle: Practice spelling {{count}} words
spelling.notEnoughWords: Need at least 3 words for spelling game
spelling.aboutDesc: Practice spelling through interactive games designed to reinforce vocabulary learning.

modeDesc.listen-type: Listen to the word pronunciation and type what you hear. Great for auditory learning!
modeDesc.scramble: Rearrange jumbled letters to form the correct word. A visual puzzle approach!
modeDesc.fill-blanks: Type the missing letters shown as underscores. Focus on specific letter patterns!
modeDesc.mixed: Randomly switches between all modes for variety and comprehensive practice!

spelling.tipStreak: Build streaks for bonus points (+10% per 3 consecutive)
spelling.tipHint: Use hints wisely - they reveal letters but reduce your score

history.title: Reading History
history.description: Your reading sessions are stored locally in your browser.
